summary: THE AIR BAG WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHO DIAGNOSED THAT A WIRE UNDER THE DRIVER'S SEAT WAS BROKEN.   THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD THAT AS LONG AS THE LIGHT REMAINED ILLUMINATED THE AIR BAGS  MIGHT NOT INFLATE IN THE EVENT OF A CRASH (PART # 3L2Z-14B455-AA).  *NLM   *NLM
